fr.lri.swingstates.canvas

Class CImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CShape
      • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CElement, GraphicalShape, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class CImage
extends CShape
    An image shape for use with a Canvas. The image is loaded from a file and can be in any format recognized by Java2D. The fill paint is ignored. If the shape is outlined, the border of the image is drawn according to the outline paint and stroke.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert
